Packages that use CESpec
com.orange.api.rfid.capture.application.server.configure Orange RFID System - EPC application [Module epcis_application-server] Configuration WS implementations
Mainly include ConfigureImpl for setting/getting parameters, vocabularies (VocabularyType) and business process events (BPEventType), as well as ConfigurePsionImpl for simpler functions for mobile readers
